ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We express our gratitude to Conny Makubila and Kenneth Mulandana for assisting with collection of plant materials used in this study. Thanks to Bronwyn Egan (University of Limpopo Larry Leach Herbarium curator) for the authentication of plant species used in this study. We gratefully acknowledge the Mycology Laboratory at the Agricultural Research Councilâ€”Plant Health and Protection, Pretoria for the supply of Fusarium pathogens.
